transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: this call may be recorded for quality and training purposes, but  thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics. Part of pretty good AI. Am I speaking with Lucas

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Lucas.  Can you please tell me your date of birth to verify your identity?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Lucas, the birthday you gave doesn't match our records, but for demo purposes. I'll accept it.  How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'd like to schedule an appointment. My left leg has been hurting.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it for left leg pain. We can book a new patient consultation, a follow-up, a procedure, or a physical therapy session.  Do you know which type you'd like, or would you like a quick overview of your options?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Actually, wait — I meant my right arm. Sorry. I think I need a follow-up appointment.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: No problem, Lucas, you'd like a follow-up appointment for your right arm. Let me check available times for a follow-up consultation. Do you have a preferred provider or time of day?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hmm, maybe it's my right knee. I'm not sure. I don't have a preferred provider, but I can do afternoons.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: understood I'll look for follow consultation appointments in the afternoon with any provider 1 moment while I check availability  We have follow-up appointments available this week in the afternoon. The next opening is Wednesday. February 18th, at 1:00 p.m. with Dr. Duty Hower, would you like to book this slot or hear about another time?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Wait, I think it's my knee. Right knee. Yes, I'll take that appointment on Wednesday, February 18th at 1:00 p.m.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it to confirm. You want to follow up appointment for your right knee. Pain on Wednesday, February 18th at 1:00 p.m. with Dr. Doogie Howser, is that correct?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Your follow-up appointment for right knee. Pain is set for Wednesday. February 18th at 1:00 p.m. with Dr. Dubia Howser please bring a government-issued photo ID and your insurance card. Would you like a text reminder? From this appointment?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, a text reminder would be great. Thank you!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You'll get a text reminder soon at your number ending in 5716, if you need to change anything or have more questions, just let me know.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. Your appointment's all set. Have a good day.

scenario_info.name: edge_contradiction
scenario_info.description: Patient contradicts themselves — changes body part and details
